content:
Attachment III -A Audit Report No. 4-1711
COUNCIL FOR UNITED STATES AID
biggest recipient during the early stage of this project, in 1959 and 1960. No further request of excess equipment for BES was made by the end of last year at the suggestion of Program Office of Mission and in view of the fact that equipment possessed by BES were about enough to meet their immediate requirements.
(5) "Detailed Arrival Report." The detailed Arrival Report is now submitted by BES within about two weeks from the date of arrival. Considering the various steps necessary at the port and time required by BES for checking and listing, we think this is reasonable. The welders, parts and tanks referred to in ?/SP's memo of 2/26/62 were allocated to TIC and PWB on March 5, 1962, part of the welders being later reallocated to SDC.
Copy each of CUSA latest correspondence with PO of Mission (C3-62-0742, C3-62-0918, C2-62-1317) is attached herewith for your reference.
Draft Audit Report No. 4-1711, uncleared, is also returned herewith. 140.112.213.82
Bnc1. draft audit report copies of CUSA letters to PO
國史饭 Academia Historica

paragraphs.content: biggest recipient during the early stage of this project, in 1959 and 1960. No further request of excess equipment for BES was made by the end of last year at the suggestion of Program Office of Mission and in view of the fact that equipment possessed by BES were about enough to meet their immediate requirements.

(5) "Detailed Arrival Report." The detailed Arrival Report is now submitted by BES within about two weeks from the date of arrival. Considering the various steps necessary at the port and time required by BES for checking and listing, we think this is reasonable. The welders, parts and tanks referred to in ?/SP's memo of 2/26/62 were allocated to TIC and PWB on March 5, 1962, part of the welders being later reallocated to SDC.
Copy each of CUSA latest correspondence with PO of Mission (C3-62-0742, C3-62-0918, C2-62-1317) is attached herewith for your reference.
Draft Audit Report No. 4-1711, uncleared, is also returned herewith. 140.112.213.82
